title: __**No sources**__
description: Strictly no requesting, mentioning or giving sources for legal or illegal drugs or paraphernalia. This includes how to synthesize, cultivate, extract substances or anything related to using TOR or DNMs. If in doubt - if your post or a reply to your post would make it easier for someone to obtain drugs or paraphernalia, it is not permitted. This does not include harm reduction related paraphernalia such as scales, reagent tests, syringes, etc.
